cu.explanation_en: Setting tr_s_preference to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause transport preference validation errors, leading to configuration rejection or incorrect routing behavior.

du.explanation_en: Setting tr_s_preference to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause transport preference validation errors, leading to configuration rejection or incorrect routing behavior.
du.explanation_zh: 將 tr_s_preference 設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid' 會導致傳輸偏好驗證錯誤，造成配置拒絕或不正確的路由行為。
